title: Old book covers and pages, fonts, commentary
content:
Some old book pages and fonts, and some commentary:  
 [http://www.thebookdesigner.com/2014/09/book-title-pages-500-years-of-ins...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414061849/http:/www.thebookdesigner.com/2014/09/book-title-pages-500-years-of-inspiration/ "http://www.thebookdesigner.com/2014/09/book-title-pages-500-years-of-inspiration/")
author: J. Tillman

comments.content: Thanks for the link to the interesting article. There are books with more extensive information and illustrations of typesetting history - you might see if you can get copies of the two volumes of Daniel Berkeley Updike's 'Printing Types: Their History, Forms and Use'. There are quite a few histories of type with images of book covers and title pages from the days of yore.
